title: compile cuda8.0
body_html:
My environments have already supported the caffe, so some dependcies I have set up before. I didn't use the anaconda, because my python/site-package has the enough things. As I set up pytorch, i only ran python setup.py, and i can work properly except for .cuda(), it raises
AssertionError("Torch not compiled with CUDA enabled")
Instead using conda install -c soumith magma-cuda75, what else commands should i run to compile the pytorch with cuda 8.0?
body_text:
